subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Andy Roddick beat Robby Ginepri, 7-6 (5), 7-6 (3), setting up a quarterfinal against the big-serving Robin Soderling at the Lyon Grand Prix in France.
snippet: Top-seeded Andy Roddick beat Robby Ginepri, 7-6 (5), 7-6 (3), setting up a quarterfinal against the big-serving Robin Soderling at the Lyon Grand Prix in France.
